title: Command Injection
description: The code constructs a command string using user input without proper sanitization or validation, which can lead to command injection.
fix: Use parameterized commands or properly escape and validate user inputs before constructing the command string.

reasoning.pattern: The code constructs a command string using user input without proper sanitization or validation, which can lead to command injection.
reasoning.exploit_example: An attacker could provide a malicious payload in the file path that includes shell metacharacters (e.g., `; rm -rf /`). When this payload is executed, it would lead to arbitrary command execution on the system.
